about.title: About NEWA
about.subtitle: NEWA is a new e-commerce platform designed for the Moroccan market. Accessible via mobile app and website, NEWA offers a modern, intuitive, and local shopping experience. With a wide range of products, fast delivery, and secure payments, NEWA is reinventing the way Moroccans shop online.

variety.title: Wide Variety
variety.description: Thousands of local and international products

mobile.title: Mobile-first
mobile.description: Experience optimized for mobile and web
